table.title: Overview
table.searchString: index=jmx mbean="*MemoryPool*" |stats first(memoryType) as "Type" first(memManagerNames) as "Memory Managers" first(usageMax) as "Max" first(usageInit) as "Init" first(usageCommitted) as "Committed" by host jvmDescription name

chart.title: Memory Pool Usage
chart.searchTemplate: index=jmx mbean="*MemoryPool*" | eval jvmpool=jvmDescription+"_"+name | timechart span=1m max(usageUsed) as "Memory Used" by jvmpool
